channel.title: Server troubles
channel.description:
I just made a server that is based on i0b ons server source. It runs great, and alot of people started playing, but when i get alot of people into the server, it starts to LAG LIKE CRAZY! This is one of my first servers to make, and i'm glad to say that in the first 7 mins i got 23 peopel in :D. So.. is there any way that i can make it not lag, or at least reduce the lag?
Please help, thanks.
--Drigerscape

item.title: Server troubles
item.dc:creator: @driger driger
item.description:
@driger wrote:

Thanks Planplan. And i do remember you from when i used to do mopar alot more

Read full topic

item.title: Server troubles
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

Try to use dodian server source.
It’s less lagg even if you have about 30+ players online.

Read full topic
